mapper.select: select substr(r.worker,1,6) as fldm, substr(r.worker,8) as worker, u.dep1, u.dep2, u.orgname, r.id, m.mingcheng, u.email, r.worker as fldmworker, m.simpleclasscode, m.jinantime, r.fenpeitime from fenlei_baohu_result r left join fenlei_baohu_main m on r.id = m.id left join fenlei_baohu_userinfo u on substr(r.worker,1,6) = u.loginname where r.fenpeiren = '进案' and substr(r.fenpeitime,1,8) = #{date} order by fldm asc
